channel.title: CVE Feed for SendPulse -- SendPulse Free Web Push
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SendPulse -- SendPulse Free Web Push

item.title: CVE-2024-9184|2024-10-17T18:12:40.722Z -- sendpulse -- sendpulse%20free%20web%20push
item.description: The SendPulse Free Web Push plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.6 due to incorrect use of the wp_kses_allowed_html function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-9184|2024-10-17T09:32:17.786Z -- sendpulse -- sendpulse%20free%20web%20push
item.description: The SendPulse Free Web Push plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting in all versions up to, and including, 1.3.6 due to incorrect use of the wp_kses_allowed_html function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
